classNames.root: pl-1 mr-0.5 bg-base-max text-primary opacity-100 hover:opacity-100

items.name: Exploration
items.tooltip: The Exploration Page enables discovery of the data at the subject level and features a cohort builder.

items.name: Analysis
items.tooltip: Learn how to use Jupyter Notebooks to explore and visualize data available by running a tutorial notebook, or use one of these examples as a launching point for your own custom analysis.

items.name: Cohort Discovery
items.tooltip: The cohort discovery application is designed to assist researchers, clinicians, and data scientists in quickly identifying and exploring subsets of individuals from large datasets based on specific criteria.

items.name: Data Library
items.tooltip: Create and manage lists of data

items.name: Workspace
items.tooltip: Gen3 workspaces are secure data analysis environments in the cloud that can access data from one or more data resources.

items.name: Profile
items.tooltip: Create API keys for programmatic data access, and review your authorization privileges to datasets and services.
